meanings.definition: The 14th letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In the Greek alphabet, xi comes after nu.
meanings.sent2: I learned about xi while studying Greek letters.
meanings.sent3: The xi letter looks like a mix of two other letters.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so elegant, the xi seemed to dance on the page.
meanings.sent5: The xi symbol stood out among the other Greek letters.

meanings.definition: A Chinese monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a yuan or ten jiao.
meanings.sent1: She received ten xi as change for her purchase.
meanings.sent2: In China, xi is a small unit of currency.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could buy a whole candy with his xi.
meanings.sent4: The value of the xi was so tiny, it felt like holding a grain of sand.
meanings.sent5: The xi coin gleamed in the sunlight, catching her eye.
